channel.title: CVE Feed for L is B Corp. -- 'direct' Desktop App for macOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for L is B Corp. -- 'direct' Desktop App for macOS

item.title: CVE-2023-41775|2024-09-26T16:05:22.603Z -- l%20is%20b%20corp. -- %27direct%27%20desktop%20app%20for%20macos
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in 'direct' Desktop App for macOS ver 2.6.0 and earlier allows a local attacker to bypass access restriction and to use camrea, microphone, etc. of the device where the product is installed without the user's consent.
